title: Modern Split Level 2 Bedroom/1.5 Bath Townhouse
posting_body: Due to the current recommendation to practice social distancing, we are providing self-guided tours.
Please email us or give us a call to inquire about scheduling a self-guided tour.
Find contemporary and beautifully designed townhomes loaded with stylish details that speak to your urban sensibilities.

What's more, these villas are situated perfectly near the excitement of downtown San Rafael and just a short drive to the beautiful San Francisco Bay Area, bringing the best of luxury living right to your doorstep.
Gated community with gated parking garages.
* Stainless steel appliances - refrigerator, stove and dishwasher
* Hardwood flooring throughout with carpeted bedroom(s)
* Decorative wall paneling with custom paint design package
This home is a must see!
2 Beds / 1,5 Baths     in Lincoln - San Rafael Hill
